title: Print, "Paper Doll Costume in White with Black Spots", 1876–80
medium: Lithograph, brush and watercolors on cream heavy wove paper
description: The bodice of this dress is white with black spots and flows into the top layer of a full skirt.  The bodice is lined with garlands of pink roses.  Below the top layer of skirt are two tiers of lace ruffles. Both the back and the front of this dress are depicted.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Paper Doll Costume in White with Black Spots", 1876–80.
1876–80. Lithograph, brush and watercolors on cream heavy wove paper. Gift of Grace Lincoln Temple. 1937-22-9.
